actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."aziende" SET
		"ragionesociale" = '{{update_form.fieldState.ragionesociale.isVisible ? update_form.formData.ragionesociale : update_form.sourceData.ragionesociale}}',
		"cf" = '{{update_form.fieldState.cf.isVisible ? update_form.formData.cf : update_form.sourceData.cf}}',
    "mail" = '{{update_form.fieldState.mail.isVisible ? update_form.formData.mail : update_form.sourceData.mail}}',
		"telefono" = '{{update_form.fieldState.telefono.isVisible ? update_form.formData.telefono : update_form.sourceData.telefono}}',
		"settore" = '{{update_form.fieldState.settore.isVisible ? update_form.formData.settore : update_form.sourceData.settore}}',
		"personafisica" = '{{update_form.fieldState.personafisica.isVisible ? update_form.formData.personafisica : update_form.sourceData.personafisica}}'
WHERE "piva" = '{{data_table.selectedRow.piva}}';
